FuncDef:
The loop-free-alternate command enables OSPF/OSPFv3 IP FRR and generates a loop-free backup route.
The undo loop-free-alternate command disables OSPF/OSPFv3 IP FRR. The loop-free-alternate command enables OSPF/OSPFv3 IP FRR and generates a loop-free backup route. The undo loop-free-alternate command disables OSPF/OSPFv3 IP FRR. By default, FRR is disabled.
ExtraInfo: Loop-free alternate (LFA) is a method of implementing IP FRR. With LFA, a device can generate a loop-free backup link to implement basic IP FRR functions. OSPF IP FRR takes effect only after the loop-free-alternate command is run.
